ygData.subject: Re: Trueshot Bow
ygData.msgSnippet: I find the best tactic is to not mention your price. Just auction that you re selling a trueshot. If someone is interested, ask. Send them a tell, NEVER answer
ygData.messageBody:
I find the best tactic is to not mention your price. Just auction that you're
selling a trueshot. If someone is interested, ask. Send them a tell, NEVER
answer publicly. If they have a problem, they simply /tell you to jump off a
cliff and go about their business. The best part is, they're not ruining your
sales by spreading their ideas of proper pricing to the zone.Unfortunately, bows
don't sell well period. I've never sold one trueshot at 200pp. I sold ONE Shaped
Darkwood 1-Cam Bow for 300pp plus a cracked darkwood shield, and I had to give
away 20 class 6 steel bladed arrows to help him make up his mind. Well, if I
sell that shield for 300pp (giving me the 600pp for the bow I normally charge)
I'm still making 240pp... (200 skill, haven't failed a bow yet). Perhaps the
real market is selling Shaped Darkwood 1-Cams (second best for damage to delay.
Best is trueshot, and that's 50 less range) to level 30+ warriors :) Sold mine
to a guy who looked REALLY decked out in armor.

-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

"Cooper, Mark" wrote:

> From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)
>
> well I feel for you .. I'm on bristlebane server and the market has been
> destroyed ... TS bow goes for 100pp .. in kelethin area.. and god help you
> if you ask for more... you get flamed like you would not believe.. but I
> just tell them thank you for your help in selling my items.. and I will do
> the same for them when they are trying to sell there items... that usually
> shuts them up fast .... they don't mind destroying your sales ... but never
> take the time to realize that you can destroy there to.. thus it is an
> effective tactic. and please realize .. it is low level newbies that are
> the problem .. always take your bows to sell in a plus 20 level zone to sell
> ... unrest is good ... but you still get jerks there.. I like to sell in
> mistmoore
>
> good hunting
>
> karvar blackhawk
> master Fletcher
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Murr Rockstroh <mrockstr@...>
> To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 1:23 PM
> Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] Trueshot Bow
>
> > From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>
> >
> > Well hello fellow fletchers. This is a semi-rant, so please pardon it.
> >
> > I have, I think, decided that I am not making anymore Trueshot Bows for
> > anyone. I am getting tired of the endless parade of idiots in Norrath
> that
> > think my price of 300pp (gone up since I have to now actually gather the
> > parts, or argue with some newbie in Greater Faydark over the value of the
> > staff, which I would gladly pay 50pp for - more than fair in my opinion
> for
> > a 5th level character). The typical conversation goes like this.
> >
> > Me: /auction Trueshot Bow 20 Dam 100 Rng 45 Del 300pp (Ranger Only)
> >
> > Idiot: /ooc or /auction or /shout Why are you charging so much for a bow
> > that costs 1pp to make?
> >
> > Me: /ooc Well first of all it costs around 15pp per attempt, not to make
> it,
> > so on average I would say it's closer to 20pp per bow. Second, would you
> > mind telling me where you get Planing tools for 1pp? This would save me a
> > great deal of money in the long run. And thirdly, why do you want to know
> > you are a rogue/warrior/paladin/..... (anything but a ranger normally),
> and
> > this is a ranger only bow.
> >
> > Idiot: /auction So why are you charging so much for it? You suk, you are
> a
> > greedy bastard, (I have forgotten the list, but you get the idea), it only
> > takes master fletcher to make it.
> >
> > Me: /ooc And I assume that you think I was simply created with this skill
> at
> > the master level? If not, then you must assume that it cost me nothing to
> > get to this level of fletching?
> >
> > Idiot: /auction Well it's pretty cheap to raise the skill, cost a friend
> of
> > mine only 50pp to get to master.
> >
> > Me: /ooc Hmmm interesting, cost me a lot more than that to do it. I am
> > nearing 200 skill and still fail the bow around 40% of time when I try to
> > make it.
> >
> > Idiot: /auction Well I think you suk and are just gouging people for money
> > that you don't deserve.
> >
> > Me: /ooc Oh and how exactly is it that the Polished Granite Tommy can sell
> > for 300pp when it cost the person selling it 0pp to make it?
> >
> > Idiot: /auction Yeah well that's different cause they are so hard to get
> and
> > you have to camp the place for hours
> >
> > Me: /ooc And how exactly is this different from me having to gather the
> > parts, and camp the Arrow Vendor for hours to get my skills up?
> >
> > /who idiot
> > No characters match the dsecription in this zone.
> >
> >
> > Other conversations involve people telling me that my 250pp to 200pp price
> > is high just to hit the combine button, I am sure you have all heard them
> > before.
> >
> > Sorry Povar, get someone else to make your trueshots for now, I have had
> it.
> >
> >
> > Vapn Maistre, Master of all weapons, Master Fletcher, Povar
> >
> >
> >
